Package student

Class NonResident

  • java.lang.Object
    • student.Student
      • student.NonResident
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    International, Tristate
    public class NonResident
extends Student
    This class extends Student and contains operations and data that are specific to nonresidents. It is extended by tristate and international.
    Author:
    Stephen Juan, David Halim

    • Field Summary

      static int nonResidentCreditHour

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      NonResident​(Profile profile, int creditHours)
      This is a constructor for a nonresident that passes on values for the student's most recent payment and the date of the most recent payment.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float getTotalCost()
      Using the number of credits the student of taking, it returns the total cost of tuition.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method returns a string representation of the student in the format "name:major:".
      void tuitionDue()
      This method calculates the tuition due by subtracting the total cost of tuition minus the money the student has already paid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NonResident

        public NonResident​(Profile profile,
                   int creditHours)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This is a constructor for a nonresident that passes on values for the student's most recent payment and the date of the most recent payment.
        Parameters:
        profile - - profile of the student (from Student)
        creditHours - - number of credits that the student is taking (from Student)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the credit hours are invalid.
